abstract: A reference to the CloudKit share record used by the CloudKit sharing controller.
overview:
## Discussion

This property provides a reference to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare] record used by [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController]. The property is `nil` if the controller doesn’t have a share record. This can happen when the controller is initialized with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController/init(preparationHandler:)] method and the preparation handler hasn’t yet been called.

# share

**Instance Property**

A reference to the CloudKit share record used by the CloudKit sharing controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var share: CKShare? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property provides a reference to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare] record used by [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController]. The property is `nil` if the controller doesn’t have a share record. This can happen when the controller is initialized with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController/init(preparationHandler:)] method and the preparation handler hasn’t yet been called.
title: share
